title: Am I good at poetry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you're good at writing poetry. Even if the poems you write rhyme, every single time.Non-rhyming poetry forces you to focus on other aspects like rhythm or line breaks or imagery, otherwise it doesn't even look like a poem.I think most famous poets specialize instead of writing all types of poetry. They stuck to what they were good at, and that's what made them great.

Well poetry that doesn't rhyme is kind of a story and everyone loves a story and poetry that does rhyme is still the same they both are just a bunch of beautiful words together to make a beautiful little writing
